Name: Starter
Title: 3 nights of commit/declines
Description: Congratulations. 3 nights of declared charge/no-charge. You have looked after the carbon entering our atmosphere. Every mighty oak was once a small acorn, like yourself. It's time for you to sprout!

Name: Hard charger
Title: 7 nights of commit/declines
Description: This looks like the beginning of a beautiful thing. You are picking, with care, the carbon efficient nights. 7 nights recorded. Keep plugging away!

Name: A roll
Title: 14 days of entering commit/declines
Description: 14 days of recording your car charge (or non-charge). You are on a roll!

Name: Redeemed
Title: 3 days missed, 3 days recommitted (in a row)
Description: We missed you a couple of days. But, lo and behold, you've come through lately. Timing is everything!

Name: Fully charged
Title: First charge of 50% of the battery
Description: Look at you! Getting serious with the charging! If you keep this up, we are going to have to name a wind-turbine blade after you. Congratulations on your first added charge of 50% or more!

Name: Overachiever
Title: 50% (of the car battery) charge coincides with an 'A' night
Description: You've earned the 'overachiever' award. You picked an A night to replenish 50%+ of you battery. Nice going!

Name: Camel
Title: 7 nights without charging. The counting of nights is suspended during any time that the user has set as a scheduled vacation. The counting of nights resumes, after the conclusion of the vacation period
Description: Can you stretch your charge even further? Well, you've shown that you can. Congratulations on earning the 'camel' award.

Name: Straight As
Title: 3 consecutive charges on 'A' nights. In other words, though the user might have declined some charges between the 'A' nights -- all user's choices to charge were on 'A' nights
Description: Boom! You only charged on 'A' nights for the last 3 charges. Nice work!

Name: Horticulturalist
Title: Tree worth of carbon, from picking the good nights
Description: This award has been a long time coming. Your efforts have resulted in you keeping a tree's worth of carbon dioxide out of the atmosphere, as compared to an internal combustion engine. Impressive!

Name: Evangelist
Title: First share of a charging statistic
Description: Spreading the word! We can't do it all by ourselves. Keep it up.

Name: Made your own luck
Title: Above average in each of your 4 groups
Description: Your persistence has paid off! You are above-average in your grade for your gird, your latitude, your car type and your co-joining cohort of drivers.

Name: Discriminating
Title: Skipped 3 consecutive D or F nights
Description: Well, you've done the hard part! Skipping a string of 'D' and 'F' nights. The world needs more discriminating people like you.

Name: Upgraded
Title: Change your kW output to home charging by >2kW
Description: Upgraded! Nice! You can charge with the big girls now! Or the big boys, if you prefer.

Name: Wingman
Title: First night selected as a 'commit' to charge after enabling the default setting of a 'decline', using Easy Mode (above)
Description: You haven't forgotten us! We were worried we wouldn't see you after you set your default choice to 'decline' a charge. Thanks for your loyalty!
